featured.text: Specifically, you will learn to prepare __(23)__ delicious items as roasted chicken, chili, turkey loaf, turkey loaf, meatballs, pasta, among others.

definition.zh_def: 辣椒，一種常用於烹飪的辛辣植物，通常用於調味或製作醬料。
definition.en_def: A chili is a spicy fruit of plants from the Capsicum genus, commonly used in cooking for flavoring or making sauces.
definition.example: I added some chili to the dish to give it an extra kick.
